tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kalgi is very friendly and professional at her work , she takes time to examine the problem properly and explains the problem in depth. was very satisfied with her ********* *** explaination . would definitely recommend the doctor for any dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kalgi knows her job very well. She was careful with the scaling procedure. She just doesn't wanna get done with the treatment quickly, but takes into consideration comfortable pace for the patient and treats the patient accordingly. Also she is a very polite person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I can say Dr. Kalgi is a perfectionist in her job, from my few routine visits. She explained me about my issue in a very polite and informative way. Also discussed the precautions for avoiding future pain.
She has very deep knowledge in her domain. A very friendly and approachable attitude towards all her patients and staff members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** *** ************* ******. Explains about the issues very clearly. Does not force to get things done just for the sake of money. Done a fabulous job for my teeth scaling. I will definitely recommend to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Friendliness and smiling nature gives comfort during treatment and also helped in bonding with doctor, due to which I felt free to ask questions.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She exactly explained the problem in layman's language for us to understand. Soft at hands and pleasant to deal with. Happy experience with follow ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kalgi was very polite and kind in explaining the procedure which she was going to perform. She treated me for toothache complaint. I am happy with her treatment and would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.
